page.title: 02INTRODUCTION II
page.content: INTRODUCTION ------------ SWANTON ABBOTT AND SKEYTON EACH HAVE A MODERN VILLAGE HALL WHERE MANY ACTIVITIES TAKE PLACE,FROM YOUTH CLUBS OR A PLAYGROUP TO AFORGET-ME-NOT CLUB. EACH VILLAGE HAS ITS CHURCH,SCOTTOW,SKETON AND SWANTON ABBOTT SHARING ONE RECTOR.SWANTON ABBOTT HAS A WESLEYAN REFORM CHURCH ALSO.THA ONE SCHOOL AT SWNTON ABBOTT UNITES THE CHILDREN OF ALL FOUR VILLAGES. THE FOUR PUBS IN THE AREA PROVIDE MEETNG PLACES FOR THOSE OF ALL AGES & TASTES WHETHER THEY REQUIRE A QUIET DRINK,A NOISY DISCO,A GAME OF POOL,DARTS OR DOMINOES OR EVEN A GOOD MEAL.
